courses.title: Beginner Hip Hop Dance
courses.description: Get started with the fundamentals of hip hop, including popping, locking, and basic choreography.

courses.title: Bollywood Fusion Dance
courses.description: Experience the vibrant energy of Bollywood with a blend of classical and modern dance moves.

courses.title: Katthak Dance Form
courses.description: Learn the essentials of salsa dancing with a focus on partner connection and footwork.

courses.title: Ballet Foundations
courses.description: Master the basics of ballet with proper form, posture, and technique for all ages.

courses.title: Contemporary Dance Expression
courses.description: Explore expressive movement through contemporary dance techniques and performance.
